lead_paragraph: Vincent Lecavalier had three goals and two assists to set a team record with his sixth consecutive multipoint game, leading the Tampa Bay Lightning to a 6-1 victory at home over the Carolina Hurricanes.
snippet: Vincent Lecavalier had three goals and two assists to set a team record with his sixth consecutive multipoint game, leading the Tampa Bay Lightning to a 6-1 victory at home over the Carolina Hurricanes.
